description: Streamline property management, construction, and service workflows with CenterPoint Connect. Search, create, and update companies, properties, employees, invoices, materials, opportunities, services, and more from one place. Automate routine tasks, track work and budgets, and keep data consistent across teams.

debug.description: Enable verbose logging for requests and responses.

baseUrl.description: Base URL for the CenterPoint Connect API.

authToken.description: Authorization header value used for every request. Include the 'Bearer ' prefix if required.

additionalHeaders.description: Extra headers to send with every request (values must be strings).

capabilities.name: companiesget
capabilities.description:
HTTP GET /companies

Optional arguments: fieldsCompanies, fieldsProfiles, fieldsEmployees, filterType, filterManager, filterSalesstatus, filterLocation, filterZipcoderangeZipcode, filterZipcoderangeRange, filterCustomCustomertype, filterSearch, include, filterUpdatedAtGt, filterUpdatedAtLt, pageSize, pageNumber, sort

Argument mapping:
• fieldsCompanies → fields[companies] (query, optional) e.g. fields[companies]=manager,name,externalId,type,propertyCount,streetAddress,locality,county,region,postalCode,latitude,longitude,recentActivity,closeRate,custom,options,integrationRelations,location,quickbooksOnlineIntegrationRelation, quotedValue,openQuotedValue,soldValue,serviceValue,productionValue,closeRateValue,modelFileTagCounts
• fieldsProfiles → fields[profiles] (query, optional) e.g. fields[profiles]=name
• fieldsEmployees → fields[employees] (query, optional) e.g. fields[employees]=name
• filterType → filter[type] (query, optional) e.g. filter[type]=Company
• filterManager → filter[manager] (query, optional) e.g. filter[manager]=74522,10897
• filterSalesstatus → filter[salesStatus] (query, optional) e.g. filter[salesStatus][0]=Sold&filter[salesStatus][1]=Lead
• filterLocation → filter[location] (query, optional) e.g. filter[location]=63
• filterZipcoderangeZipcode → filter[zipcodeRange][zipcode] (query, optional) e.g. filter[zipcodeRange][zipcode]=12
• filterZipcoderangeRange → filter[zipcodeRange][range] (query, optional) e.g. filter[zipcodeRange][range]=33
• filterCustomCustomertype → filter[custom.customerType] (query, optional) e.g. filter[custom.customerType][0]=Admin
• filterSearch → filter[search] (query, optional) e.g. filter[search]=company
• include → include (query, optional) e.g. include=manager,location
• filterUpdatedAtGt → filter[updated_at][gt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][gt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• filterUpdatedAtLt → filter[updated_at][lt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][lt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• pageSize → page[size] (query, optional) e.g. page[size]=25
• pageNumber → page[number] (query, optional) e.g. page[number]=2

capabilities.name: invoicesget
capabilities.description:
HTTP GET /invoices

Optional arguments: authorization, fieldsProductions, fieldsProperties, fieldsCompanies, fieldsEmployees, fieldsProfiles, filterLastsentat, filterProductiondomain, filterProductionworkprofileid, filterProductiontruckid, filterInvoicetype, filterProductionaccountmanager, filterProductionarchived, filterHasbeeninvoiced, filterUpdatedAtGt, filterUpdatedAtLt, aggregatesSubtotal0, aggregatesAmount0, aggregatesMargin0, aggregatesCost0, include, sort, pageSize, pageNumber

Argument mapping:
• authorization → Authorization (header, optional) e.g. 54748d91aaf019c83c3c66edd2324fbb
• fieldsProductions → fields[productions] (query, optional) e.g. fields[productions]=name,domain,workType,options,invoicePurchaseOrder,propertyCompany,profile,billedCompany,property,workProfile
• fieldsProperties → fields[properties] (query, optional) e.g. fields[properties]=name,locality,region,manager,externalId
• fieldsCompanies → fields[companies] (query, optional) e.g. fields[companies]=name,type,externalId
• fieldsEmployees → fields[employees] (query, optional) e.g. fields[employees]=name
• fieldsProfiles → fields[profiles] (query, optional) e.g. fields[profiles]=name
